title: NBA: Collin Sexton shines in best plays of the week
description: Watch the best plays from last week's NBA action featuring Collin Sexton's three-pointer for the Cleveland Cavaliers against the Brooklyn Nets to extend the game's overtime.

title: How Brexit shapes views on Scottish independence

description: The front pages focus on proposals to force some arrivals to the UK to self-isolate in hotels.

title: Covid: Cancel developing countries' debt, MPs urge
description: A committee says the pandemic is increasing hardship and food insecurity among the world's poor.

title: Harvey Weinstein: Court agrees $17m payout for accusers
description: The money comes from the liquidation of a firm co-founded by the disgraced film director.

title: Co-op and Morrisons see queues over payments outage
description: The supermarket chains confirmed that an ongoing issue is affecting payments processing in some stores.

description: Watchdog warns of low university chances for white working youths in former industrial towns.

title: Coronavirus: EU to tighten vaccine exports amid row with AstraZeneca
description: The EU says it is unacceptable that AstraZeneca is cutting the number of pledged vaccine doses.

description: The Senate has confirmed Janet Yellen as first female treasury secretary in US history.

description: The UK is the second market - after the US - to get Facebook's latest news feature.

title: Hope and fear as Somalia’s civil war turns 30
description: Thirty years since Somalia plunged into civil war, BBC Africa correspondent Andrew Harding has returned to Mogadishu to see what hopes people have for peace.

title: Like a good deal? Maybe a hagglebot can help
description: Artificial intelligence is getting better at negotiating and research promises systems that could help you.
